name: Pacman Mirror Configuration
description: Configures pacman mirrorlist for faster package downloads on Arch Linux and Arch Linux ARM

mode.description: Mirrorlist source mode: builtin (embedded lists), url (custom URL), reflector (auto-select), official (archlinux.org API)

mirrorlistUrl.description: Custom URL to download mirrorlist from (used when mode=url or as fallback for mode=reflector)

country.description: Comma-separated country codes for mirror filtering (e.g., 'DE,FR,US') - for reflector/official modes

protocol.description: Protocol filter for mirrors - for reflector/official modes

mirrorCount.description: Number of fastest mirrors to include - for reflector mode

uncommentServers.description: Uncomment #Server lines after downloading mirrorlist (for url and official modes)
